Posts.Content: May 16, 2009 08:34PM molokai wrote: Check out UCLA. I just had a bilat mastectomy and DIEP reconstruction there and have only good things to say. My surgeons were Raquel PratiÂ  (breast) and Jaco Festekjian (plastics and reconstruction). Call Jeani Primes (breast reconstruction coordinator) at 310-794-4126 to get more information. Of course, I don't know your medical details or whether or not you'd be a candidate for immediate reconstruction and DIEP, but I can whole heartedly recommend UCLA. I'm a physician myself.
Posts.Title: Looking for LA area PS and general surgeon evie5 tablover
